channel.title: Brooks WP – Creative Multi-Purpose WordPress Theme

image.title: Brooks WP – Creative Multi-Purpose WordPress Theme

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: profi_admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: profi_admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: APP SHOW CASE
item.dc:creator: profi_admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle" brooks_bg_overlay="dark" brooks_bg_grad="yes" css=".vc_custom_1473078777319{background-image: url(http://brooks.iondigi.com/app-showcase/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/asphalt_texture-copy-asphalt_texture.png?id=21) !important;}" el_id="home"][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][vc_column vc_hidden-xs" position_offset="{``top``:{``lg``:``380px``},``left``:{``lg``:``300px``}}"][vc_empty_space brooks_responsive_height="{``height``:{``lg``:``300``,``xs``:``100``,``md``:``300``}}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row brooks_is_container="theme__container" equal_height="yes" el_id="about"][vc_column brooks_parallax_item="yes" parallax_delta="50" el_class="theme-box-shadow" css=".vc_custom_1473159340818{padding-top: 0px !important;}" position_offset="{``top``:{``sm``:``-80px``,``md``:``-50px``,``lg``:``0px``}}"][vc_row_inner equal_height="yes" css=".vc_custom_1473094510816{background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1473095284921{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}" offset="vc_col-md-3"][vc_custom_heading text="ABOUT GAME" google_fonts="font_family:BenchNine%3A300%2Cregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" font_container="tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%23000000" font_size="30" css=".vc_custom_1473094789393{padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text font_size="1" css=".vc_custom_1473095038932{padding-top: 10px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"]Old Style Racing is a classic time killer for iOS. It was designed as a retro cars racing game.[/vc_column_text][brooks_theme_btn link="url:%23|title:GET%20GAME||" css=".vc_custom_1473183962882{margin-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_empty_space brooks_responsive_height="{``height``:{``lg``:``20``,``md``:``20``}}"][vc_single_image image="248" img_size="large" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1473089660406{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1473095318829{border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;border-left-color: #878787 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;}" offset="vc_col-md-9"][vc_single_image image="106" img_size="full" alignment="center"][vc_custom_heading text="MORE DETAILS" google_fonts="font_family:BenchNine%3A300%2Cregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" font_container="tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%23000000" font_size="0" css=".vc_custom_1473094878133{padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text font_size="1" css=".vc_custom_1473154422198{padding-top: 10px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"]The gist of the game comes down to maneuvering a car between barriers and oil puddles on the road and collecting coins. More coins, more chances for upgrading your car. The gamer may use this local currency for purchasing a new car styling package or even a new car. Also player can choose different locations from existing. The subsequent updates will be increasing the number of car modifications and more locations.[/vc_column_text][brooks_theme_btn link="url:%23|title:GET%20GAME||" css=".vc_custom_1473183952914{margin-left: 30px !important;}"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row brooks_is_container="theme__container" equal_height="yes" css=".vc_custom_1473081460766{margin-top: -180px !important;background-image: url(http://brooks.iondigi.com/app-showcase/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/yellow-back.png?id=200) !important;}" el_id="how-to-play"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_empty_space brooks_responsive_height="{``height``:{``lg``:``200``,``xs``:``140``,``sm``:``120``}}"][vc_custom_heading text="HOW TO PLAY" google_fonts="font_family:BenchNine%3A300%2Cregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" font_container="tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%23000000" font_size="0"][vc_column_text font_size="1"]The gist of the game comes down to maneuvering a car between barriers on the road and collecting coins. The more coins, the more chances you have for upgrading your car. The longer the player overcomes the barriers, the bigger the number on the odometer will be. This indicator identifies each users position in the Game Center ranking.[/vc_column_text][brooks_theme_btn link="url:%23|title:GET%20GAME||"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" position_offset="{``top``:{``lg``:``50px``}}"][vc_empty_space brooks_responsive_height="{``height``:{``lg``:``200``,``sm``:``120``}}"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" brooks_parallax_item="yes" parallax_delta="100" position_offset="{``left``:{``lg``:``30px``,``sm``:``50px``},``z-index``:{``xs``:``2``},``top``:{``sm``:``30px``,``md``:``0px``}}"][vc_single_image image="156" img_size="full"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" brooks_parallax_item="yes" parallax_delta="300" position_offset="{``left``:{``lg``:``-70px``,``sm``:``-30px``},``z-index``:{``xs``:``1``},``top``:{``lg``:``50px``,``md``:``100px``}}"][vc_single_image image="155" img_size="full"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space brooks_responsive_height="{``height``:{``lg``:``60``}}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row brooks_is_container="theme__container" equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1473081326282{margin-top: -20px !important;}" el_id="features"][vc_column width="1/6" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-4 vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs" position_offset="{``top``:{``lg``:``-350px``},``left``:{``lg``:``30px``}}"][vc_single_image image="318" img_size="large"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" offset="vc_col-md-4" position_offset="{``top``:{``lg``:``20px``},``left``:{``lg``:``-50px``}}"][vc_single_image image="165" img_size="large"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3" position_offset="{``top``:{``md``:``-20px``}}" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-8"][vc_custom_heading text="GAME FEATURES" google_fonts="font_family:BenchNine%3A300%2Cregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" font_container="tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%23000000" font_size="0"][vc_column_text font_size="1" css=".vc_custom_1473087596153{margin-left: -20px !important;}"]
  • UPGRADE YOUR CAR. You can choose color or even styling package.
  • GREAT GRAPHICS and smooth physics simulation.
  • UNIQUE MUSIC and sound effects.
  • HIGH SCORE. Improve your driving skill by increasing your result on your favorite speedway.
[/vc_column_text][brooks_theme_btn link="url:%23|title:GET%20GAME||"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6" position_offset="{``top``:{``lg``:``425px``}}" offset="vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][vc_single_image image="363" img_size="large" alignment="right"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row brooks_is_container="theme__container" css=".vc_custom_1473148838529{background-image: url(http://brooks.iondigi.com/app-showcase/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/yellow-back-2.png?id=305) !important;}" el_id="pricing"][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12" brooks_parallax_item="yes" parallax_delta="100" offset="vc_col-md-4"][vc_empty_space brooks_responsive_height="{``height``:{``lg``:``100``}}"][brooks_pricing_block text_color="#ffffff" text_bg_color="#e6c31e" image="343" button_link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fitunes.apple.com%2Fus%2Fapp%2Foldstyleracing%2Fid1063023836%3Fmt%3D8|title:DOWNLOAD|target:%20_blank|" title="OSR I" price="FREE"]
  • UPDATE: 26 july 2016
  • VERSION: 1.4
  • SIZE: 86,3 MB
  • LANGUAGE: English
[/brooks_pricing_block][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12" brooks_parallax_item="yes" parallax_delta="100" position_offset="{``left``:{``lg``:``-30px``,``sm``:``-50px``,``md``:``0px``}}" offset="vc_col-md-4"][vc_empty_space brooks_responsive_height="{``height``:{``lg``:``100``}}"][brooks_pricing_block text_color="#ffffff" text_bg_color="#e6c31e" image="344" button_link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fitunes.apple.com%2Fus%2Fapp%2Foldstyleracing%2Fid1063023836%3Fmt%3D8|title:DOWNLOAD|target:%20_blank|" title="OSR II" price="FREE"]
  • UPDATE: 27 july 2016
  • VERSION: 1.3
  • SIZE: 51,3 MB
  • LANGUAGE: English
[/brooks_pricing_block][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Contact form 1

item.content:encoded:
<label> Your Name (required) [text* your-name] </label>
<label> Your Email (required) [email* your-email] </label>
<label> Subject [text your-subject] </label>
<label> Your Message [textarea your-message] </label>
